mapper.sql: ELEMENT_FLOW, ELEMENT_NAME, ELEMENT_CODE, ELEMENT_VAR_NAME, MODULE_CODE, ELEMENT_SERIAL, COLUMN_COUNT, ORDINAL, RECORD_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_FLOW, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_FLOW
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from PDSCI.PUB_ELEMENT
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into PDSCI.PUB_ELEMENT (ELEMENT_FLOW, ELEMENT_NAME, ELEMENT_CODE, ELEMENT_VAR_NAME, MODULE_CODE, ELEMENT_SERIAL, COLUMN_COUNT, ORDINAL, RECORD_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_FLOW, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_FLOW) values (#{elementFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{elementName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{elementCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{elementVarName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moduleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{elementSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{columnCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordinal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{recordStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

ELEMENT_FLOW,

mapper.update:
update PDSCI.PUB_ELEMENT
ELEMENT_FLOW = #{record.elementFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ELEMENT_NAME = #{record.elementName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ELEMENT_CODE = #{record.elementCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ELEMENT_VAR_NAME = #{record.elementVarName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODULE_CODE = #{record.moduleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ELEMENT_SERIAL = #{record.elementSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COLUMN_COUNT = #{record.columnCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDINAL = #{record.ordinal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RECORD_STATUS = #{record.recordStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_USER_FLOW = #{record.createUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_USER_FLOW = #{record.modifyUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update PDSCI.PUB_ELEMENT set ELEMENT_FLOW = #{record.elementFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ELEMENT_NAME = #{record.elementName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ELEMENT_CODE = #{record.elementCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ELEMENT_VAR_NAME = #{record.elementVarName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODULE_CODE = #{record.moduleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ELEMENT_SERIAL = #{record.elementSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COLUMN_COUNT = #{record.columnCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDINAL = #{record.ordinal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RECORD_STATUS = #{record.recordStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_USER_FLOW = #{record.createUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_TIME = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_USER_FLOW = #{record.modifyUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update PDSCI.PUB_ELEMENT
ELEMENT_NAME = #{elementName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ELEMENT_CODE = #{elementCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ELEMENT_VAR_NAME = #{elementVarName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODULE_CODE = #{moduleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ELEMENT_SERIAL = #{elementSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COLUMN_COUNT = #{columnCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDINAL = #{ordinal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RECORD_STATUS = #{recordStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_USER_FLOW = #{createUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_USER_FLOW = #{modifyUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ELEMENT_FLOW = #{elementFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update PDSCI.PUB_ELEMENT set ELEMENT_NAME = #{elementName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ELEMENT_CODE = #{elementCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ELEMENT_VAR_NAME = #{elementVarName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODULE_CODE = #{moduleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ELEMENT_SERIAL = #{elementSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COLUMN_COUNT = #{columnCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDINAL = #{ordinal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RECORD_STATUS = #{recordStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_USER_FLOW = #{createUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_USER_FLOW = #{modifyUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ELEMENT_FLOW = #{elementFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
